Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CaLL (Lys-rich; synthetic AMPs20, cecropin + LL-37 hybrid peptide, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: hybrid peptide, combined natural fragments, designed, man-made sequences

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 60.7% similarity toHuman KS-27 (LL-37 derived).  N-terminal cecropin + the LL-37 core peptide.Activity: Active against B. anthracis spores (MIC 7.8 ug/mL), B. anthracis vegetative (MIC 31.3 ug/mL), and gram- B. cepacia (MIC 31.3 ug/mL). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Fox MA, Thwaite JE, Ulaeto DO, Atkins TP, Atkins HS.
Literature Information.Title: Design and characterization of novel hybrid antimicrobial peptides based on cecropin A, LL-37 and magainin II.
